data.title: G'day from Sydney
data.description: Australia is one of the most popular travel destinations in the world.

data.title: G'day from Thandiani Top
data.description: Thandiani (literally meaning very cold) is a hill station in the Galyat area of Pakistan.Thandiani is characterized by excellent weather and lush greenery in the summer months, and snow-covered vistas and hills in the winter.
